name: Captain T
description:
Controls

MovementWASD + Mouse
Enter / leave canonE or Enter
FireSpace

The Game

Goal

Hit as many towers as possible. Each tower takes 4 hits. Didn't had enough time for proper landscaping and a ending. I hope you still enjoy it :)

Story

Hoy, me hearties! Here I am, a pirate captain, alone on my ship. Me crew is feeding the fish after I thew them overboard. They tried to eat me, the bastards!

Oh, didn't I mention: I was cursed... Blimey, and you couldn't imagen a worse curse. That bloody fairy transformed me into a tomato. A tomato! Can you believe that?
My treasure, piles and piles of gold and silver and rum, are now easy prey for all those other buggers. So I'm getting rid of everyone: Dead men tell no tales.

-

Our Submit to Kenney Jam 2020. First Time Unity. First Time 3d .
